mapper.select: select distinct company,card_name,img_cnt from mwCard where company = #{value}
select distinct path from card_img, mwCard where card_img.company = mwCard.company and card_img.img_cnt = mwCard.img_cnt and mwCard.card_name=#{card_name}
mapper.delete: delete from mwRegisterCard where id=#{id} and num=#{num}
delete from mwRegisterAccount where id=#{id} and num=#{num}
mapper.select: select * from mwCard where card_name in (select card_name from mwRegisterCard where card_name like '%' || #{card_name} || '%')
select count(*) from mwRegisterAccount where id=#{id} and account_num=#{account_num} and account_company=#{account_company}
select count(*) from mwRegisterCard where id=#{id} and card_name=#{card_name} and account_num=#{account_num}

select card_company,card_name from (select card_company,card_name,count(card_name) from(select mwRegisterCard.card_name,mwRegisterCard.card_company,trunc(MONTHS_BETWEEN(sysdate,to_date(birth_y,'yyyy'))/12+1) as age from mwmember,mwRegisterCard where mwmember.id = mwRegisterCard.id) where age between 20 and 30 group by card_company,card_name order by count(card_name) desc) where rownum<=3
